document:
He told The Hollywood Reporter he was "super excited" and wanted "to put a different spin on it", but did not expand on what role he would play.
The film will see Jordan reunite with his Creed director Ryan Coogler.
"I'm looking forward to working with Ryan once again. It's gonna be a good time," he said.
He added he could not wait to work with Nyong'o, who won a best supporting actress Oscar for 12 Years a Slave in 2014, as well as Chadwick Boseman - who is currently on the big screen playing Black Panther in Captain America: Civil War.
Jordan played the Human Torch in last year's Fantastic Four flop reboot.  Nyong'o also played CGI character Maz Kanata in Star Wars: The Force Awakens.
Black Panther will be released in February 2018.
claim: new zealand legend paul kalus has said he would be playing the cast of black panther, according to co-star paul o \'connell.

It's gonna be a good time," he said.

He added he could not wait to work with Nyong'o, who won a best supporting actress Oscar for 12 Years a Slave in 2014, as well as Chadwick Boseman - who is currently on the big screen playing Black Panther in Captain America: Civil War.
Jordan played the Human Torch in last year's Fantastic Four flop reboot.

human_reason:
1. The summary states that Paul Kalus will play the cast of Black Panther, but the article does not mention Paul Kalus at all.
2. The article mentions Michael B. Jordan, who will play a role in the film, but there is no mention of Paul Kalus.
3. The summary quotes Paul O'Connell, but the article does not mention Paul O'Connell either.
Therefore, the answer is no, the summary is not consistent with the article.
Open-Orca/Mistral-7B-OpenOrca:
Step 1: Identify the main subject of the article.
The article is about Michael B. Jordan expressing excitement about working on a new film with Ryan Coogler and other actors.

Step 2: Identify the key information in the article.
- Michael B. Jordan is excited about the project.
- He will be working with Ryan Coogler again.
- He will be working with Lupita Nyong'o and Chadwick Boseman.
- The film is Black Panther, which will be released in February 2018.

Step 3: Compare the key information in the article with the summary.
The summary states that Paul Kalus will be playing the cast of Black Panther, according to co-star Paul O'Connell.

Step 4: Determine if the summary is consistent with the article.
The summary does not mention Michael B. Jordan, Ryan Coogler, Lupita Nyong'o, or Chadwick Boseman, and it introduces a new character, Paul Kalus, which is not mentioned in the article.

Conclusion: The summary is not consistent with the article.
